        "title": "Welcome!",
        "text": "Hello and welcome to a new workday! Embrace the opportunities that lie ahead and make the most of your time. Let's dive into the world of Node.js and explore its fascinating features.",

    },

        "title": "Welcome two!",
        "text": "Witness the breathtaking beauty of a golden sunrise, bringing warmth and tranquility to the start of a new day.",

        "description": "Hello and welcome!",

    },
    {
        "id": 9,
        "title": "Welcome!",
        "text": "Hello and welcome to a new workday! Embrace the opportunities that lie ahead and make the most of your time. Let's dive into the world of Node.js and explore its fascinating features.",
        "created_at": "2023-08-10T12:52:01.000Z",
        "description": "Hello and welcome to a new workday!",
        "user_id": 1
    },
    {
        "id": 8,
        "title": "Active Lifestyle: Embracing Fitness and Sports",
        "text": "Get your heart pumping and stay healthy by engaging in various sports and fitness activities. From jogging to yoga, there's a world of possibilities waiting for you!",
        "created_at": "2023-08-10T11:00:43.000Z",
        "description": "Discover the benefits of an active lifestyle.",
        "user_id": 1
    },
    {
        "id": 7,
        "title": "Bike Trails and Beyond: Exploring Nature by Bicycle",
        "text": "Escape the hustle and bustle of the city and immerse yourself in nature's beauty with leisurely bike rides along picturesque trails. Experience the tranquility of the outdoors.",
        "created_at": "2023-07-10T10:58:48.000Z",
        "description": "Connect with nature through cycling.",
        "user_id": 1
    },
    {
        "id": 6,
        "title": "Sporting Excellence: Celebrating Achievements in Athletics",
        "text": "Join us in applauding the remarkable achievements of local athletes who have showcased exceptional dedication and prowess in their respective sports.",
        "created_at": "2023-06-10T10:56:47.000Z",
        "description": "Highlighting the success of our local sports stars.",
        "user_id": 1
    },
    {
        "id": 4,
        "title": "Sunrise Serenity: Embracing the Beauty of a Sunny Morning",
        "text": "Witness the breathtaking beauty of a golden sunrise, bringing warmth and tranquility to the start of a new day.",
        "created_at": "2022-08-10T09:42:29.000Z",
        "description": "Embrace the serenity of a sun-kissed morning.",
        "user_id": 1
    },
    {
        "id": 3,
        "title": "Weekend Vibes: Wishing You an Amazing Weekend Ahead",
        "text": "As the weekend approaches, we send you warm wishes for a relaxing and enjoyable time ahead. Make the most of your well-deserved break",
        "created_at": "2022-08-10T09:42:17.000Z",
        "description": "Get ready for a fantastic weekend!",
        "user_id": 1
    },
    {
        "id": 5,
        "title": "Healthy and Happy: The Joy of Outdoor Workouts",
        "text": "Experience the invigorating joy of outdoor workouts, whether it's a game of tennis, a jog in the park, or a group fitness class. Stay active and enjoy the fresh air!",
        "created_at": "2022-06-10T10:56:17.000Z",
        "description": "Elevate your mood with outdoor exercise",
        "user_id": 1
    }
]
